comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: I suppose the Chinese admiral is returning a courtesy.  Grant visited China in 1879 as a former President, and the Chinese took it as quite an honor; he was warmly received.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: This was the occasion of the visit of Rear Admiral Ching Pih Kwang on Monday September 18, 1911. Here: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9C07E4DA1131E2...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Thanks lifeasdaddy for the info. about Kwang's visit. We'll add it to the description next time we update the record.
